categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Motamba was a male Wookiee munitions expert who served in the Wookiee underground resistance movement during the Galactic Civil War.
Motamba was one of the Wookiees who spearheaded the search for the Gran thief Kea Ra-Lan after she infiltrated Kashyyyk and stole ancient texts from the vaults of Neocomora.
